resources.string:
Better known by this stage name Saptasur Music Company [Mangesh More (Executive Director and Producer)] is an Indian (Maharashtra) Music production Company based in Mumbai and Pune.


Known for his signature blend of Marathi, Hindi, Saptasur remixes and other various popular songs. Songs ‘Katta Kirrr’ (Adarsh Shinde), Sonyachi Jejuri (Pravin Kadam), Morya Tujhya Namacha Gajar (Aanandi Joshi and Adarsh Shinde) are breakdown the record of youtube and various social media platform in Marathi film industry.


Saptsur Music is one of the Indian most popular and success music production company in music production industry from 2012.


It continuing launch various brand popular song of Saptasur Music.


Saptsur Music Company launches song produced by Mangesh More and collaborated with artist such as Adarsh Shinde, Pravin Kadam, Aanandi Joshi (Singer), Ashish More (Music), Shafi Khatib, Amitabh Arya ( Lyrics), Megha Ghadge, Subhodh and Jitu (Choreography).

Yave Shama Evangelical Church is a multi-lingual full-gospel Assembly of God (AG) Church in Pune City. Our Vision and Mission is to bring the unreached to Jesus Christ through evangelism, lead them to worship the Almighty God, make them true disciples of Christ with due fellowship with the body of Christ, and cater to the needs of the society through humanitarian services.
View Worship Schedule

Mangesh More is a Directror and Producer of Saptsur Music Conmpany. 

They got verius award for his recognition in the music industry. 

His one of the femous music and video songs, Kaata kirr break all the record of Maharashtriyan music. For the success, he is the main pillar of Saptsur Music Company. 

He is trying his best for music indurstry and music lovers.
Shop No.G- 201, First Floor, Mega Center, Hadapsar, Pune- 411028
